name: Justice.exe
description:
Justice.exe is a dialogue-heavy dystopian legal drama in which you defend sentient AI in court. Chat with your clients to discover the case details, extract information from your dialogue and study them to whip them into proper arguments, and find leads to new witnesses, they are crucial in court later on. Then engage the opposing counsel in wits, charisma and skullduggery. Small choices might alter the fate of your clients.

Are you going to be a silver-tongued devil of the courtroom, the detective turned officer of the court or just bulldoze opposing counsel in bureaucracy by sheer hard work and willpower?
